name: Senior DevOps Engineer
description:
Cogniteq is looking for an experienced Senior DevOps Engineer to join the team. As a Senior DevOps Engineer, you will be responsible for managing and improving our infrastructure and deployment processes, developing automation tools, and collaborating with development and operations teams to ensure high availability and reliability of our systems.​​​​​​​
​​​​​​​
Our ideal candidate would possess a broad technical knowledge and practical experience, but we also value their intellectual capacity, problem solving skills and ability to make meaningful connections.

❗Please note that we are searching for candidates for a part-time job❗

If this sounds like you we would be happy to chat with you!

Responsibilities:

  • Implement systems that are highly available, scalable, and self-healing on the AWS platform
  • Design, manage, and maintain tools to automate operational processes on AWS
  • Automate security controls, governance processes, and compliance validation on AWS
  • Work closely with developers to implement continuous delivery systems and methodologies on AWS
  • Define and deploy monitoring, metrics, and logging systems on AWS
  • Build tools and processes to support the infrastructure
  • Informally train and share AWS knowledge within the team

Qualifications:

  • 5+ years Windows and Linux systems administration

  • 2+ years provisioning, operating, and managing AWS environments

  • Certified on at least one: AWS DevOps Engineering, AWS Certified Developer - Associate, or AWS Certified SysOps Administrator - Associate

  • Proficient with AWS services: Compute and Network, Storage and CDN, Database, Analytics, Application Services, Deployment, and Management

  • Experience with multi-tier architectures: load balancers, caching, web servers, application servers, databases, and networking

  • Familiarity interacting with AWS APIs

  • AWS Disaster Recovery design and deployment across regions a plus

  • Experience in automation and testing via scripting & programming (TFS, PowerShell, Jenkins, Python, Javascript)

  • Clear written and verbal communication (B1 level of English)

  • Manage your own time and work well both independently and as part of a team
